channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: NFL Week 8 Team of the Week: Running Backs Star; Jordan Love Wows on Sunday Night
item.description: Greg Auman reveals the standout performers from NFL Week 8, headlined by two Packers on Sunday night.

item.title: Does Kyle Larson's Past Cup Title Make Him Favorite at Phoenix?
item.description: Kyle Larson is the only driver in the Championship 4 who has ever won it all. But does that mean he should be favored at Phoenix?

item.title: 4 Takeaways From the Packers' Win Over the Steelers
item.description: The Green Bay Packers got the better of Aaron Rodgers and the Pittsburgh Steelers on Sunday night.

item.title: LSU Fires Brian Kelly After Blowout Loss to Texas A&M
item.description: LSU's blowout loss to Texas A&M was the final straw for Brian Kelly in Baton Rouge.

item.title: Happy National Tight Ends Day! A Look at the Position's Best on a Football Holiday
item.description: Tucker Kraft and George Kittle thrived, while two rookies rose to the occasion on National Tight Ends Day.

item.title: Orioles tab Albernaz as next manager, sources say
item.description: The Baltimore Orioles are finalizing a deal to hire former Guardians associate manager Craig Albernaz, sources told ESPN on Sunday.

item.title: Flagg ignites Mavericks' offense in first NBA win
item.description: Mavericks rookie Cooper Flagg became the fifth-youngest player in NBA history to score at least 20 points in his first NBA win Sunday.

item.title: Love outduels Rodgers as Pack tout 'the successor'
item.description: With former Green Bay quarterback Aaron Rodgers watching from the sidelines, Jordan Love showed just how much he learned from his predecessor en route...

item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Ratcliffe blocks Man United move for Lewandowski
item.description: Manchester United minority owner Sir Jim Ratcliffe has blocked a shock move for Barcelona striker Robert Lewandowski. Transfer Talk has the latest new...

item.title: After emotional week, Fields helps Jets stun Cincy
item.description: Justin Fields helped the Jets stage one of the biggest comebacks in franchise history, stunning the Bengals on Sunday.
